title: i use a steam controller
body: any chance this will get me banned?

replies.body:
It depends on what software you're using to get the Steam Controller working with League and if that software has features that can give you a competitive advantage. Since we don't develop the software that could provide controller functionality, it's hard for us to greenlight any of the software as "okay to use". Ultimately, any feature or configuration that isn't available in-game falls under a [**try at your own risk**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/225266848-Third-Party-Applications) category.

If you have any other questions, let me know.
